channel.title: How did all this non working stuff start?
channel.description: Im new and i was just wondering how all of this non-working server stuff started for example. Non working castlewars and non working duel arena.

item.title: How did all this non working stuff start?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Motokid126, post:11, topic:334874”][quote author=Frell link=topic=431268.msg3168770#msg3168770 date=1270251268]

It was never added in, the very first server only supported picking up items, wearing them and walking. Everything sense then has been added in horribly and unoptimized.

No, the first server supported flying over runescape, not interactive. Then walking was added in. Only after that was item support added.

I meant the first server as we know it
[/quote]

So basically, whoever got started on rsps first, all it was was basically runescape maps? And walking, running, everything else was added in?[/quote]Yes. It’s referred to as “flight over runescape”. You would be able to go over the runescape map and watch random items pop up. That was winterLove. It was made just to show that it was possible to emulate. Following that, development furthered to learn more about cheating in runescape. Following that, development furthered because people saw opportunity in making a private server.

Read full topic
item.source: How did all this non working stuff start?

item.title: How did all this non working stuff start?
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:10, topic:334874”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=431268.msg3168661#msg3168661 date=1270245990]

It was never added in, the very first server only supported picking up items, wearing them and walking. Everything sense then has been added in horribly and unoptimized.

No, the first server supported flying over runescape, not interactive. Then walking was added in. Only after that was item support added.
[/quote]
I meant the first server as we know it ;)[/quote]

So basically, whoever got started on rsps first, all it was was basically runescape maps? And walking, running, everything else was added in?

Read full topic

item.title: How did all this non working stuff start?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Frell:

It was never added in, the very first server only supported picking up items, wearing them and walking. Everything sense then has been added in horribly and unoptimized.

No, the first server supported flying over runescape, not interactive. Then walking was added in. Only after that was item support added.

Read full topic

item.title: How did all this non working stuff start?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

LilXCj:

Maybe because when Private servers were created, it was from scratch. It’s not like we could’ve ripped the entire RuneScape source and replicate what they currently have.

Well everything but the Stream, cryption, misc class. Everything else has been made by us.

Read full topic
